main event: A single unidentified object was observed in the sky in Fairborn, Ohio on 16 October 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed for 1 hour and 30 minutes on a straight course,It was reported as a meteor or satellite with a bright appearance that twinkled rapidly and moved upwards,The sky was bright and clear, with cirrus clouds that occasionally obscured the object,The witness did not hear any sound coming from the object, and it appeared white in color,The conclusion of the report categorizes the sighting as astronomical.
sighted object: a bright object moving straight upwards
witness description: an individual aged 43 with three children present
